section.title: Equals Processor
section.para: Sets user-given pField of all notes in soundObject to user-given value, i.e. set all p4's to value "440", or set all p6's to value "/work/audio/wav/mySample2.wav". The following score:
If used with an EqualsProcessor with value 7.00 and pfield 4, would result in the following score:
(The p2 and p3 times above are post-processing for a 2 second duration soundObject with time behavior or scale.)
Tip: One can use this noteProcessor to quickly try reassigning a score to another instrument to test what that would sound like by reassigning p1.
